resources.string: Pocket mode will launch the lockscreen when no notifications exist and lockscreen secure enabled
Show the notification text around the ring
Use active display style for notification details
Limit the notification to once per time period
Turn screen off with double tap
After receive a notification won\'t run active display until user shakes
Intensity of shake needed to display notifications
Seconds that shake is active after receiving a notification, 0 means always active.
Hide notifications marked as low priority
Show pending notifications after taking the device out of your pocket
Time the proximity sensor must be covered before active display is shown
No notifications will be shown for these apps
No details will be shown for notifications from these apps
Show the date above the clock
Show AM/PM indicator when using the 12-hour time format
Put to sleep after woken by pocket mode and returned to the pocket
重置所有的动画设置为默认值吗？
防止应用覆盖过渡效果。
应用可以覆盖过渡效果。
添加、 移除和调整应用栏中的项目

触摸时应用栏一侧会显示标签。
显示在屏幕的上面、中间或底部的一侧。
Change the size of the visible tab.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical position of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area

ART is not officially supported by PAC-Man ROMs as it is highly experimental and has the potential to cause instability, crashes, data loss or prevent the proper boot of your device. Visit Introducing ART for more information.

We request you do not file bug reports if you have enabled ART as your runtime.

Are you sure you want to reboot to change runtime from %1$s to %2$s?
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Bypass insecure lock screen with smart covers
仅可用于支持扩展通知的应用
添加、 删除和编辑手势
无法加载 %s。请确保您有足够的可用存储。
有传入任务时 Halo 将出现，一段时间后自动消失
使用 Halo 打开一个应用时底层应用将暂停
为传入通知显示消息框
设备处于解锁状态时，如果收到新通知 Halo 将出现。
Defines how big Halo is going to be
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
Halo will ping when silent notifications are received
Show heads up notification always expanded
Show updates from pending background notifications as heads up
在屏幕底部显示浮动通知
按下暂停按钮禁用浮动通知 %d 分钟。
浮动通知将显示 %d 秒。
Heads up notification will show till it is dismissed.
在这里测试输入法动画
Zipalign any unaligned apps on each boot
Fix permissions on apps and their data on each boot
Clear application cache files each boot
Speed up file systems at boot
启用/禁用 minfree 优化
启用/禁用 GPU 渲染优化
启用/禁用 journalism 优化

It looks like init.d isn\'t setup properly. Please contact your ROM developer.
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
隐藏键盘后禁用自动旋转传感器 %1$s 秒
Note: This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is out. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Open Test Dialog with a ListView
安全解锁之前显示滑块
安全解锁机制之前显示锁屏滑块
必须绘制手势才能解锁屏幕
按下电源按钮时立即锁定
解锁环周围显示电池电量水平
当设备从口袋取出时打开屏幕并显示全部通知。放回口袋时关闭屏幕
当设备从口袋取出时始终打开屏幕，即使没有通知
隐藏低优先级通知，如 Google 即时的天气通知
隐藏所有不可清除的通知
允许清除即使不可清除的通知。当然，它们只是从锁屏隐藏而并不是从通知面板清除
允许长按时在正常和展开视图之间切换。展开的视图有时会显示更多的私人信息，所以您可能希望禁用它
默认显示扩展通知。您仍可以在扩展视图和正常视图之间切换
在收到通知时唤醒屏幕
当收到新通知时唤醒设备
禁用通知显示和清除。您只是看到通知的图标
动态设置通知的宽度，使它们只使用真正需要的空间
已排除的应用将不会显示为锁屏通知
显示锁屏背后的内容，可能造成您的数据被周围人看到。
重置所有大小条目为默认吗？

设置横屏时导航栏高度。

拖动右边区域可重新排列。滑动可删除。
在整个屏幕上启用滑动切换，而不仅仅是在屏幕底部

请确认已启用 OmniSwitch。您可以点击下方的“设置”来完成此操作。
Top pie does not show status and clock information
Change the button icon color mode
To avoid conflicts with status bar or navigation bar, the triggers on these edges are automatically turned off if one or both are available
Mirror right pie on the horizontal axis
Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time and date information
Reduces left and right trigger size if keyboard is active
Reduce or increase the trigger sensitivity
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Change the shorcuts icon color mode
Change the shorcuts icon color mode
No other navigation is currently enabled. Turning off the navigation bar can result in an unusable device. Do you want to enable pie controls instead?
No other navigation is currently enabled. Turning off pie controls can result in an unusable device. Do you want to enable navigation bar instead?
Minimum one of the main triggers (bottom, left or right) needs to be enabled.
Tick to show or untick to hide the clear all button within the recent applications screen
Choose in which corner the clear all recent apps button is shown

This RAM bar shows the actual android memory (RAM) utilization. Please note that having cached apps helps your device open apps much faster. For further explanations on how android memory (RAM) management works, check the help menu.
Reset RAM bar style to default?
Use custom application instead of the recent applications dialog
Display the name of the currently connected Wifi network
SystemUI will restart to apply changes
Use Slim Recents instead of default recents view
Recent apps panel size in percent.
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge.
Reset progress bar style to default?
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Fine grained control of volume for specified sound streams
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Whether to pull weather information and display it throughout the ROM.
Setting a custom location can save some battery. Otherwise network-location is used to determine your location.

Be sure to follow the examples! Setting an invalid location will stop you from getting weather updates and may cause unexpected behavior.\n\nExamples: New York,NY // New York, NY // 10033 // London, England
Unable to retrieve location information for weather update
Enabling this will display weather temperature in Celsius rather than Fahrenheit and windspeed in km/h rather than mph.

"Obtaining location from network is currently disabled. This breaks the ability to get the current weather in your current location. Please set a custom location or enable obtaining your location from your network."
